short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate flashcard and quizzes from any website using LitGrades, the world's best flashcards and quizzes AI for students.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The LitGrades extension allows you to generate flashcards from any website! Simply select the text, and click generate to use our AI and generate flashcards instantly.
